siteMetadata.author: Adam Bulmer
siteMetadata.description: Software Engineer from Manchester writing posts on CSS, React, JavaScript and Web Performance.

markdownRemark.html:
I would love you to get in touch with me, I do not actively place my email address in the wild, so you can get in touch by tweeting me or by visiting my Linkedin

  • Career opportunity Linkedin or tweet me and we can DM.
  • Development question tweet me
  • Question about an open source project I work on Github
  • Domain you wish to buy from me tweet me

Please no recruitment agencies.
